title: Mini Meatballs with Queso Fusion Taqueritos
ingredients: Seasoned salt and pepper to taste
instructions: Step 1. In a blender, place the onion, chili, carrot, and water
Step 2. Blend and then mix with the ground beef.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste and let rest.
Step 4. Make the mini meatballs and roll them in the flour, egg, and Taqueritos.
Step 5. These can be blended in a food processor or in a bag by hand.
Step 6. Heat the oil and once it"s ready, fry the meatballs.
Step 7. Serve with a little ranch dressing.
